scripts.pdf:all: npm run pdf:resume && npm run pdf:cv
scripts.pdf:resume: npm run _copy:resume && npm run _replace:secrets && md-to-pdf docs/tmp/履歴書.md && npm run _move:resume && npm run _clean:tmp
scripts.pdf:cv: npm run _combine:cv && md-to-pdf docs/tmp/職務経歴書.md && mv docs/tmp/職務経歴書.pdf docs/pdf/ && npm run _clean:tmp
scripts._combine:cv:
first=true; for f in docs/md/職務経歴書/*.md; do if [ "$first" = true ]; then first=false; else echo; echo '
'; echo; fi; cat "$f"; echo; done > docs/tmp/職務経歴書.md
scripts._replace:secrets: sed -i -e "s|<TEL>|$(grep TEL secrets.env | cut -d '=' -f2 | tr -d '\\r\\n')|g; s|<ADDRESS>|$(grep ADDRESS secrets.env | cut -d '=' -f2 | tr -d '\\r\\n')|g; s|<KANA>|$(grep KANA secrets.env | cut -d '=' -f2 | tr -d '\\r\\n')|g; s|<BIRTH>|$(grep BIRTH secrets.env | cut -d '=' -f2 | tr -d '\\r\\n')|g; s|<EMAIL>|$(grep EMAIL secrets.env | cut -d '=' -f2 | tr -d '\\r\\n')|g" docs/tmp/履歴書.md
scripts._move:resume: mv docs/tmp/履歴書.pdf docs/pdf/履歴書.pdf
